content: diversion is a wide asymmetric crochet scarf worked on the bias using bold colours i hope the colours make you smile so wide that you feel a pinch in your cheeks it has been so long since a project skipped so effortlessly out of my mind i loved the simplicity of the stitch combination and i had that giddy just one more row affliction as i raced towards each colour change the scarf has a wonderful drape and a great texture offset linen stitch the pattern is easy to memorise and very meditative once you get used to where to insert your hook you may also enjoy the companion pattern to this scarf buddy wrist warmers 1 which uses some of the left-over yarn from the scarf enjoy dedri 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/buddy-wrist-warmers
